pullRequest.title: [systemtest] KafkaST: fix failed tests
pullRequest.bodyText:
Signed-off-by: Lukas Kral lkral@redhat.com
Type of change

Bugfix

Description
Fix failed tests in KafkaST from our job:
io.strimzi.systemtest.KafkaST.testKafkaJBODDeleteClaimsTrueFalse - OCP3, OCP4 - fixed bad wait for PVC deletion
io.strimzi.systemtest.KafkaST.testKafkaJBODDeleteClaimsFalse - OCP3 - race condition, tried 5 times, always green
io.strimzi.systemtest.KafkaST.testLabelModificationDoesNotBreakCluster - OCP4 - race condition, 5 times green
io.strimzi.systemtest.KafkaST.testCustomAndUpdatedValues - OCP4 - bad order of waitTillSsHasRolled

Checklist

 Make sure all tests pass
